meanings.sent1: The bilander sailed smoothly across the calm sea.
meanings.sent2: The captain navigated the bilander through the narrow channel.
meanings.sent3: The crew on the bilander had a picnic on deck.
meanings.sent4: The bilander cut through the waves like a knife.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flags on the bilander fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: To transport goods on a bilander.
meanings.sent1: They decided to bilander the cargo to the neighboring island.
meanings.sent2: The company chose to bilander the supplies using the small ship.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see them bilander the heavy crates onto the deck.
meanings.sent4: She bilandered the goods with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: The villagers watched as they bilandered the goods onto the shore.

meanings.definition: The act of sailing on a bilander.
meanings.sent1: Sailing on a bilander was a thrilling experience for the tourists.
meanings.sent2: The sailors enjoyed the adventure of the bilander journey.
meanings.sent3: The race between the two bilanders was full of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The bilander race was the highlight of the maritime festival.
meanings.sent5: The passengers cheered as the bilander glided gracefully on the water.
